artifact.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this {{artifact}}?

configurations.configDescription: Configurations are the settings and parameters that define how an application behaves and interacts with other systems.

dataclasses.dataclassDescription: A data class is used to define and structure the data within a process application. It is used to manage data consistently across processes and forms.

deploy.logDescription: Returned log output from the engine.
deploy.target: Specify the engine to which you want to deploy the current workspace.

forms.formDescription: A form is a user interface element that facilitates data entry and interaction with the application, acting as a bridge between users and the system.

market.description: Here you can find and download reusable components, templates and solutions to accelerate development.
market.selectVersion: Select the version to be installed
market.title: Axon Ivy Market

message.artifactNotEmpty: Artifact name must not be empty.
message.artifiactNamespaceNotEmpty: Artifact namespace must not be empty.
message.capitalizeName: It's recommended to capitalize the first letter.
message.dataclassPackaged: The dataclass cannot be deleted as the project to which it belongs is packaged.
message.dependencyPackaged: The dependency cannot be deleted as the project at hand is packaged.
message.formPackaged: The form cannot be deleted as the project to which it belongs is packaged.
message.invalidChar: Invalid character '{{- char}}' at position {{pos}} in '{{- str}}'.
message.invalidIar: Select an .iar file or a .zip file that contains .iar files.
message.processPackaged: The process cannot be deleted as the project to which it belongs is packaged.

processes.processDescription: A process describes a sequence of automated steps that optimize workflows and enables efficient task management within an application.

projects.dependecyInfo: Dependencies are links between projects which allow one project to access the functionality or artefacts of another and avoid duplicating work.
projects.description: Here you can view the project dependencies.

config.readFail: Failed to read configuration with params: {{app}} {{pmv}} {{path}}

editor.fileTypeIncompatible: This file type '{{type}}' can not be edited in NEO.

market.inaccsessible: Maybe the market is currently not accessible
market.loadBestMatchingFail: Failed to load best matching market artifact version for {{id}} with engine version {{engineVersion}}
market.loadFail: Failed to load market product versions for {{id}}
market.loadJsonFail: Failed to load product json for {{id}} with version {{version}}
market.versionUndefined: Artifact version of {{id}} needs to be defined to retrieve product json

project.bpmnEngineStopFail: Failed to stop BPM Engine for project '{{pmv}}'

toast.serverStatus: Maybe the server is not correclty started
toast.unauthorized: Unauthorized, click reload to log in.

workspaces.description: Here you can find the projects you have created along with any imported projects in this workspace. A project contains all the essential components needed to build an application.
workspaces.importWarning: The import can overwrite existing project versions.
workspaces.info: A workspace is the development area where an application is built and tested. It's the space where your business processes are designed, previewed and simulated before they're deployed as a functioning application.
workspaces.title: Welcome to {{neo}}: Manage your workspaces
